# Invitation to Tender for Ballistic Helmets
=============================================

**Tender Reference Number**: WS3888910991
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Publication Date**: March 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: April 12, 2023, at 14:00 hours (CDT)

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**: Price, with the lowest price being the most favorable.
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**: Saskatchewan
**Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Contracting Authority Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

**End-User Entity**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
**End-User Entity Address**: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0P9, Canada

**Contact Information**:  Waterproof Requirements Inc. cannot find the name of the contact. She can be contacted via: `ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`

**Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15722379?extsite=MTU3MjIzNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Notice Description (Authority’s Need)**:
The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of 18 ballistic helmets that meet specific mandatory specifications, which can be found in the attached statement of requirement. 

**Limitations and Conditions**: This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian content. Only bids that include Canadian goods will be considered. All bids must be in Canadian dollars and comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and policies.

Due to the high demand, this procurement is subject to cancellation at any time. Note that changes to this procurement will be posted to the Government of Canada Tender Notice Web Site and/or on the Bid Solicitation System at `http://buyandsell.gc.ca`, in accordance with the Federal Purchasing Regulations. 
Link to Bid Solicitation system: http://buyandsell.gc.ca/
Include the system of the Bid solicitation which includes the SPAC/pwgsc internal contact, who maintains this notice site.
